GSD.description:
ax25: improve the incomplete fix to avoid UAF and NPD bugs

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.181 by commit cfc8b37ef0418529e3719c2d128e59e74a3114b0. For more details please see the references link.
